full_threads.body:
Hello, this is the mail server on mail2.helpscout.net.

I am sending you this message to inform you on the delivery status of a
message you previously sent. Immediately below you will find a list of
the affected recipients; also attached is a Delivery Status Notification
(DSN) report in standard format, as well as the headers of the original
message.

<wordpress@dblevents.com.au> delivery failed; will not continue trying

X-PowerMTA-VirtualMTA: helpscout-mta
Received-From-MTA: dns;pconsumer-0453803e2c7d81639 (10.0.200.170)
Arrival-Date: Thu, 20 Dec 2018 02:45:07 +0000

Final-Recipient: rfc822;wordpress@dblevents.com.au
Action: failed
Status: 5.1.1 (bad destination mailbox address)
Remote-MTA: dns;aspmx.l.google.com (172.217.197.26)
Diagnostic-Code: smtp;550 5.1.1 The email account that you tried to reach does not exist. Please try double-checking the recipient's email address for typos or unnecessary spaces. Learn more at https://support.google.com/mail/?p=NoSuchUser 89si1851214qtb.9 - gsmtp
X-PowerMTA-BounceCategory: bad-mailbox
